name: Agentic AI for Hardware Design Verification
description: Achieve coverage closure in design verification of sub-system and module level designs. Built with LangGraph and OpenAI API.

name: Collagent
description: An agent with custom tools for university data integration. Built with LangGraph. For students.

name: Data Den
description: A AI workspace to optimize data analytics tasks with GPU acceleration. Built with LangChain utilizing SOL supercomputer.

name: Python Sandbox API
description: Sandboxed Python execution API. Built with nsjail and Flask. Deployed on Google Cloud Run.

name: Medical Image Classification with DL
description: Benchmarking on MedMNIST datasets using frameworks with ResNet architectures.

name: MIPS Multicycle Processor
description: A modular MIPS multicycle processor implementation focused on simulation, analysis, and educational exploration of processor design.

name: Matrix Multiplier
description: A Verilog-based systolic 4x4 matrix multiplier with integrated RAM, optimized for hardware design and computation.
